name: css-border-colors
description: Css module of single purpose classes for border colors

scripts.start: tachyons src/css-border-colors.css > css/css-border-colors.css && tachyons src/css-border-colors.css --minify > css/css-border-colors.min.css && tachyons src/css-border-colors.css --generate-docs --package=../../package.json > readme.md
